title: Indiscreet
description: Sexiest man alive. Playboy movie star. Reckless actor.  Will Baker, better known as “Fitz,” is back, and the world has questions.  Where did he go? Why is he back? Who is Maggie Sharp, the girl who found him?  As Will and Maggie flee her family’s troubles, they return to a world most only dream of, where privacy belongs to the highest bidders, and loving Will might cost Maggie everything she has.  Secrets mean betrayal, and Will’s are bigger than most.  As he returns to a life of wealth and excess, will he fall back into his old vices too? Or is loving Maggie Sharp the one thing that will save him?
author: Nicole  French
